name: Attack on Trumpocracy
description:
A game totally not designed to depict Trump in a plot to undermine democracy using an absolute slew of clones.

Disclaimer: In case it matters, this game does not accurately depict any opinion(s) or views of Trump, Obama or any person(s) appearing anywhere, it is solely meant as a fictional parody that happens to portray real life people.

You (and maybe a friend (LAN co-op)) take the role of defense in this ridiculous wave shooter defense. You must use 2 of 5 different weapons to stop the growing hoard of evil clones from reaching their destination. Currently 3 destinations to defend, each unlocked by completing the previous.

Bugs aren't unlikely, anything you're particularly annoyed at, feel free to poke me at joshgamedev@outlook.com

Keyboard + Mouse operated, keybinds currently not configurable.

Made using Unity Game Engine. https://unity.com/

Spec Requirements (guesses):

Not an intensive game, however might not run on machines older than 10+ years.

Memory: 2GB+ RAM

CPU: Great Dual-Core or Decent Quad-Core+

GPU: anything older than 2010 should run (even integrated)

Storage: Zip contains 400MB of data, Zip currently 160MB of data
